name: 7DRL 2023 - Grand Strategy Roguelike
description:
This tech demo was developed during 7DRL challenge 2023. 

I spent way too much time on world and character generation and setting up the code architecture so there is no actual gameplay included. 

But I still wanted to share my progress of the last 7 days as I learned a lot during the week and want to continue working on the project after the jam!
